mapper.update: UPDATE `edu_lesson_class_common_homework` SET `total_score` = (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(score), 0) FROM `edu_common_homework_question` WHERE `common_homework_id` = #{id}) WHERE `id` = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT h.*, c.`num` AS `classStuNum` FROM `edu_lesson_class_common_homework` h, `edu_lesson_class` c WHERE h.`id` = #{id} AND h.`lesson_class_id` = c.`id` AND c.`is_deleted` = 0

SELECT h.`id`, h.`title`, h.`difficulty`, h.`end_time`, s.`status` FROM `edu_lesson_class_common_homework` h LEFT JOIN `edu_common_homework_stu_score` s ON h.`id` = s.`homework_id` AND s.`stu_id` = #{stuId} WHERE h.`lesson_class_id` = #{classId} AND h.`is_publish` = 1 ORDER BY h.`create_time` DESC

SELECT h.`type`, h.`title`, h.`difficulty`, h.`total_score`, h.`start_time`, h.`end_time`, s.`status`, s.`score` AS `stuScore`, s.`comment` FROM `edu_lesson_class_common_homework` h LEFT JOIN `edu_common_homework_stu_score` s ON h.`id` = s.`homework_id` WHERE h.`id` = #{id} AND h.`is_publish` = 1

SELECT s.`status`, h.`is_complete_after_explain`, h.`is_end_after_explain`, h.`end_time` FROM `edu_lesson_class_common_homework` h LEFT JOIN `edu_common_homework_stu_score` s ON h.`id` = s.`homework_id` AND s.`stu_id` = #{stuId} WHERE h.`id` = #{id} AND h.`is_publish` = 1
